title: Submit a Claim to a Payer
description: A biller needs to submit a finalized claim to an insurance company for payment.

tasks.description: Identify a claim that has been coded and is ready for submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller finds a claim in the 'Ready to Bill' work queue.

tasks.description: Run the claim through a 'claim scrubber' to check for common errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: The claim scrubber checks for issues like invalid diagnosis codes or missing information. The claim passes the check.

tasks.description: Batch the claim with others going to the same payer and transmit it electronically via the clearinghouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: The claim is successfully sent to the payer, and its status is updated to 'Submitted'.
